measured_by: Sustained Attention to Response Task (SART) performance
justification: "The SART is of interest because it highlights the executive-control processes necessary to overcome the habit of responding, which is induced by go trials being more common than nogo trials."
"The first of these bound the propensity to mind wander to the rate for correctly identifying target (nogo) stimuli (γ_nogo|nogo)."
"We bound mind wandering propensity to the rate for incorrectly identifying target (nogo) stimuli as a non-target (γ_go|nogo) – the mismatching rate."
construct: Failure of selective attention to rare events

justification: "The final model … bound mind wandering propensity to the rate to correctly identify non-target (go) stimuli (γ_go|go)."
"The third model bound the propensity to mind wander to the rate of the timing process (γ_T)."
"In the fifth model, we bound mind wandering propensity to volatility in processing task-relevant information (σ_E)."
"In the sixth and final model, we bound mind wandering propensity to volatility in temporal processing (σ_T)."
